name: QuackerJack
description:
Roll up! Roll up! Test your skill in this quacktastic challenge of accuracy and speed - now in VR!

You have 60 seconds and more ducks than you can count, so get shooting!

---

Also playable in a web browser! >>  https://jacksinko.itch.io/quackerjack <<

PC Controls: Left click to shoot, hold ctrl to look around.

---

QuackerJack was made in 3 weeks as a student project at the Academy of Interactive Entertainment. Produced for the Oculus Go, but also compatible with the Oculus Quest and PC.

Buff Duck Studios is:

Design:
- Daniel D'Onofrio
- Ben Hinckley

Programmers:
- Erick Watson
- Jack Sinko

Artists:
- Nathan Crawford
- Charles Ferwerda
- Jaedan Kennaway

Music and Sound Design:
- Daniel D'Onofrio
https://soundcloud.com/danv1

Some audio assets used from freesound.org under free-to-use licenses. Details inside the download.

Download a PC or Android build (Oculus Go) below, or play now on the web here.
